experiences.description: Led the product development of a SaaS-based CRM platform for small businesses. Conducted market research, defined product requirements, and managed the product roadmap. Increased user adoption by 40% within the first year.

Managed a portfolio of communication products, including VoIP and video conferencing solutions. Implemented agile methodologies to improve product development efficiency. Successfully launched three new product features, resulting in a 25% increase in revenue.

Spearheaded the development of an AI-powered customer service platform. Oversaw the entire product lifecycle from concept to launch, focusing on user experience and market fit. Built and mentored a team of product managers.

education.description: Specialized in Data Science and Artificial Intelligence. Conducted research on machine learning algorithms for predictive analytics.
Focused on Strategy and Marketing. Developed a comprehensive understanding of business principles and global market dynamics.
